description:
Step into the world of high-end fashion retail with Fashion Store Simulator! Start small and grow your boutique into a must-visit shopping destination. Design a stylish store, stock the latest trends, and keep customers coming back for more.

Key Features:
- Build & Customize: Upgrade your store with chic decor, fitting rooms, and eye-catching displays.
- Curate the Trends: Sell everything from designer dresses to stylish accessories.
- Smart Management: Set prices, run promotions, and maximize profits.
- Customer Satisfaction: Keep shoppers happy to grow your reputation.
- Marketing & Events: Host fashion shows, sales, and VIP launches.

The fashion world is yours to conquer! Will your boutique become the hottest spot in town, or will you be drowning in unsold sequin jackets? Grab your clipboard, trust your instincts, and create a shopping experience that turns heads!
